comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: trueachievements.com

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO MV2 1.45.2 + IDCAC 3.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.trueachievements.com/game/McPixel-3/achievements

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList, EasyList Lithuania, Adblock List for Finland, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. As per https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/14280#issuecomment-1334484365, it appears that AdGuard Base needs to add `trueachievements.com##.ad-center` due to it having `@@||trueachievements.com^$generichide`. The rest of the details are in that thread.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/204981028-c7c96998-1b53-4ae3-b9f1-3f926060f4c9.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: This should not be considered stale, as the site has some degree of notability among Xbox achievement hunter and Windows UWP-app researchers.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: trueachievements.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO MV2 1.45.2 + IDCAC 3.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.trueachievements.com/game/McPixel-3/achievements

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList, EasyList Lithuania, Adblock List for Finland, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. As per https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/14280#issuecomment-1334484365, it appears that AdGuard Base needs to add `trueachievements.com##.ad-center` due to it having `@@||trueachievements.com^$generichide`. The rest of the details are in that thread.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/204981028-c7c96998-1b53-4ae3-b9f1-3f926060f4c9.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
The problem is that extension for Firefox/Opera cannot download/update JavaScript rules and in this case website doesn't work correctly if cookie notice is just hidden (log in button doesn't work).
Please add this rule:
```adblock
shopstyle.co.uk#%#document.cookie='gdpr={"types":["ESSENTIAL"],"platform":"web"};path=/;';
```
to user rules.

https://tor-browser-rus.ru/ (Fake Tor website, suspicious file download)
https://tor-project.ru/ (Fake Tor website, suspicious download links, broken download links after reporting)

comment.body:
I have added additional rules which maybe will fix it (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours), but the problem is that content blockers for Safari has limited abilities compared to other browsers (I cannot reproduce this issue with AdGuard for Chrome).
For instance, some regular expression rules do not work and JavaScript rules sometimes are executed too late and due to this some ads, popups/popunders are not blocked.

comment.body:
Though the site seems to require logging in, I'm thinking there may be problems with some of the enabled lists. If OP sees this, they can try turning off DNS filtering and see if that helps.

If that doesn't work either, perhaps turning off Stealth Mode, Fanboy's Annoyances, or AdGuard Annoyances could be tried out.

comment.body:
Hello

I can't reproduce the problem with your settings.

1. Please go to settings > Safari > extensions, disable all AdGuard extensions and enable them again.
2. Go to the AdGuard app and update the filters, wait 2-3 minutes without closing the app.
3. Reboot your device
4. Go to this site and check for ads, there shouldn't be any.

If this does not help, please contact our support: support@adguard.com

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
